entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 15.
